i work at google.
i had to get a job early as a child.

participant_2.background:
I love to visit music blogs and forums, especially ones that are about music I sell in my store.
I grill salmon and vegetables on my George Foreman grill at home for a quick and healthy meal.
I found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs.
I eat my feelings.
I want to be a good role model for my daughters.

content.text: Hi! I'm a 24-year-old software engineer. I love technology, music, and movies. What about you?
Hi! I'm a 26-year-old music store owner. I love hiking, music, and cooking.
Wow! We have a lot in common. I love hiking too! I have a tattoo on my back that my parents don't know about.
That's cool! I love music blogs and forums, especially ones that are about music I sell in my store.
I love reading music blogs too! I like to stay up-to-date on the latest music news.
Me too! I also love to cook. I grill salmon and vegetables on my George Foreman grill at home for a quick and healthy meal.
That sounds delicious! I love salmon. I'm more of a baker myself. I love making chocolate chip cookies.
I love chocolate chip cookies too! I also love to eat my feelings.
Me too! I'm trying to be healthier, but it's hard.
I know what you mean. It's a struggle.
What are your goals for the future?
I want to be a good role model for my daughters. I want to show them that they can do anything they set their minds to.
That's a great goal! I'm sure you'll be a great role model.
